note.title: Sample Feature Box Using Graphic Design Client Feedback
note.para: This is the Description of the “Spotlight on Ethics” FB from the WEG: This feature will highlight an ethics issue related to the concept, skill, or activity being taught in the text. These might discuss in relation to a real-world case, might dig deeper into an ethical concept being discussed, or might present an ethical dilemma for the student to think through. There will be 1–2 Spotlight on Ethics boxes in each chapter.
